query:
draftOrders(first: 10, after: 0, filter: {
      "draftorder": true,
      "processingStatusIn": [
        "Draft",
        "Failed"
      ],
      "user": "48619",
      "SalesOrganization": "2601",
      "ShipToParty": "0070041641",
      "SoldToParty": "0000100740"
    }, sort: "created_at") {
            id
            itemlist
            draftorder
            BillingDocument
            eZRxNumber
            SoldToParty
            ShipToParty
            CompanyName
            TotalOrderValue
            requestedDeliveryDate
          }
